header.author: John Powell
header.title: A Letter from Mr. John Powell, to Sir Hans Sloane, Bart. Pr. R. S. &c. concerning a Gentlewoman Who Voided with Her Urine, Hairy Crustaceous Substances: To Which is Annexed Sir Hans Sloane's Answer, Containing Several Observations of Extraordinary Substances Voided by the Urinary Passages
